Generate an SVG of a praying mantis on a dew-covered leaf. Show a triangular head with two large compound eyes and a flexible neck. The raptorial forelegs must be folded, displaying spines. Include six clearly segmented legs (coxa, femur, tibia, tarsus). Add semi-transparent veined wings, a slender segmented abdomen, and antennae. Position it in three-quarter view with soft bokeh background gradients.

Create an SVG side view of a steam locomotive (4-6-2 Pacific). Show four leading wheels on a bogie, six large driving wheels connected by side rods, and two trailing wheels. Include pistons, valve gear, smokebox door, headlamp, and a tall funnel. Draw rails with sleepers at even spacing. Add steam clouds and correct coupling rods alignment and motion geometry.

Produce an SVG of an Apollo-era astronaut on the Moon. Include an A7L suit with a gold visor, life-support backpack (PLSS), and ridged joint rings at shoulders and elbows. Show boots leaving crisp footprints in regolith. Place the American flag with a horizontal support rod. Low Sun angle casts long shadows. Curved horizon, gray terrain, and Earth in the black sky.

Draw an SVG of a great white shark in profile. Show countershading: dark gray dorsal surface, white underside. Include five distinct gill slits, a crescent-shaped caudal fin with larger upper lobe, triangular serrated teeth visible, and a lateral line. Pectoral fins angled slightly downward. Add remora fish beneath. Background suggests a shipwreck silhouette and light rays from above.

Generate an SVG of a worker honeybee gathering pollen from a sunflower head. Show three body segments (head, thorax, abdomen) with fuzzy thorax hairs. Include two pairs of transparent veined wings, six legs with visible tarsi, and pollen baskets (corbiculae) laden on hind legs. The proboscis should contact florets. Sunflower disc displays spiral phyllotaxis; leaves serrated; stems slightly rough.

Create an SVG of a medieval trebuchet in side view. Show a sturdy triangular frame, axle at the apex, and an asymmetrical throwing arm with a longer projectile side. Include a hinged sling holding a stone, a heavy box counterweight, and taut ropes. The release pin angles the sling for ~45° launch. Ground planks, pegs, and shadows must align consistently.

Render an SVG top view of a 2022-era ground-effect Formula 1 car. Show the halo over the cockpit, narrow nose, front wing with four elements, undercut sidepods feeding venturi inlets, and a sculpted rear wing with an open DRS flap plus a beam wing. Depict four exposed 18-inch tires, correct wheelbase proportions, wheel covers, and a visible driver helmet.

Draw an SVG of a male northern cardinal perched on a thin branch. Show the raised crest, thick conical orange beak, and black facial mask around the bill and throat. Feathers should layer: primaries, secondaries, and coverts. Tail slightly fanned. Feet anisodactyl—three toes forward, one back—gripping the branch. Include subtle feather barbs and bark texture; background muted.

Generate an SVG cross-section of a chambered nautilus. Show a precise logarithmic spiral shell divided by septa into chambers, with a central siphuncle running through them. The living chamber near the opening contains the animal: hood, eye, and numerous slender tentacles extending outward. Include fine shell ribbing and subtle pearlescent shading. Background should suggest water with gentle gradient bands.

Produce an SVG of a common octopus investigating a glass jar on the seafloor. Depict eight arms clearly, each with double rows of suckers varying in size. The mantle is rounded, eyes forward-facing with horizontal pupils. Beak hidden beneath arms. One arm should reach into the jar’s mouth, glass reflecting highlights. Add sand ripples, scattered shells, and soft caustic light.

Inside a late-15th-century Florentine workshop (viewBox 0 0 2000 1200), stage a camera obscura projecting a sunlit street onto a 500x700 mm poplar panel (scaled 1px=1mm). Two-point perspective: horizon y=700; vanishing points at (-2500,700) and (4500,700). Place an apprentice referenced at 7.5 heads tall; head = 1/7.5 of body; elbow at waist; hands = 1/10 of height. Sun at 35° elev, 20° azimuth; use feSpecularLighting with fePointLight matching window coords. Paper notes in mirror-script as textPath on a spiral spline. Oak workbench uses patternUnits='userSpaceOnUse' wood grain, clipped with mask for wear. Metal compasses reflect via feColorMatrix cool highlights; quill nibs use marker-end. Require chiaroscuro via layered radial gradients and cast shadows consistent with vanishing geometry.

Render a cutaway blueprint of a 1930s bathysphere mid-dive, mixing orthographic overlays with perspective (viewBox 0 0 1800 1200). Pressure hull radius 1500 mm (scale 1px=2mm); wall thickness 38 mm; fused-silica viewport 300 mm diameter, 90 mm thick. Internals: winch drum 800 mm OD, 4:1 gearing; crank links 250 mm center-to-center; gauge needle 60 mm, pivot at true center. Outside, bioluminescent siphonophores use animated stroke-dasharray illusions; water caustics via feTurbulence+feDisplacementMap. Rivets are a symbol reused 240 times with precise polar placement. Lighting: diver’s lamp at 15°, 2300K; apply feSpecularLighting with feSpotLight through the window. Annotate stresses with text-on-path arcs. Simulate condensation as layered blur+morphology droplets; ensure refraction offsets align with viewport curvature.

Depict a High Gothic cathedral nave at golden hour with rigorous geometry (viewBox 0 0 2200 1200). Nave width:height = 1:2.414; bay spacing = 6 m (scale 1px=50 mm). Pointed arches spring at 1/3 height; rib vaults cross at 2/3 span. Rose window radius 4.5 m; tracery follows 12-fold symmetry; stained glass panels narrate the Tetramorph with iconography accurate to 13th-century France. Two-point perspective: horizon y=620; VPs at (-3000,620) and (5200,620). Sun at 12° elevation west; colored caustics from glass via feColorMatrix spectral split and soft masks on dust rays. Stone ashlar pattern with slight random noise. Choir stalls employ non-scaling-stroke filigree; Latin motto on textPath along archivolt. Require correct occlusion of clustered columns and shadow penumbrae across pews.

Design a Martian spaceport loading scene with a bipedal cargo mech and dust physics (viewBox 0 0 2100 1200). Atmosphere: butterscotch sky; sun at 25° elevation, hard shadows 0.38g length scaling. Mech proportions: hip height 1.2× torso height; shoulder yaw 45°, elbow 110°, knee 140°; twin hydraulic pistons (Ø80 mm, stroke 300 mm) oppose each joint. Pressed-regolith landing pad shows wheel ruts using height-field mask; dust devils via feTurbulence+feDisplacementMap animated offsets. Heat shimmer above reactor exhaust: subtle feDisplacementMap on background only. Materials: matte ceramic armor (Roughness high), anodized aluminum joints (specular highlights via feSpecularLighting). Use markers for hazard chevrons; label crates with ISO container codes. Perspective: horizon y=580; VP1 (-4000,580), VP2 (4400,580).

Illustrate an 1890s surgical amphitheatre with precise anatomy yet restrained depiction (viewBox 0 0 2000 1200). Tiered seating uses concentric arcs; riser height 180 mm; tread depth 280 mm. Gas lamps at 3200K create warm top lighting; add feDropShadow for soft penumbrae. On the table, model the upper limb with accurate proportions: humerus ≈ 19% of body height, forearm ≈ 15%; scapular plane angled 30° relative to frontal. Show tendons and muscular origin/insertions schematically (low saturation, no gore), labeled via leader lines with marker-end arrows. Instruments (bone saw, forceps) reflect cool highlights; use non-scaling-stroke for etching. Perspective: single-point, horizon y=950, VP at (1000,950). Include chalk diagrams on slate as white text-on-path curves. Require glass glare simulated by clipped specular streaks.

Compose a Baroque still life: silver ewer, glass goblet (n≈1.52), peeled lemon, grapes, and velvet drape (viewBox 0 0 1800 1200). Candlelight 1800K at 25° left; add feSpecularLighting with fePointLight, Fresnel-like rim via layered radial gradients. Silverware reflects scene geometry; simulate environment by pre-baked gradient maps and subtle feColorMatrix hue shifts. Lemon peel curls 3 mm thick, 18 mm wide; pith rendered with noise mask. Goblet refraction distorts a vertical grid behind; ensure displacement magnitude matches glass thickness. Dew on grapes as repeated symbols with specular hotspots; micro-scratches via fine stroke-dasharray. Velvet uses a directional anisotropic sheen (approximate with gradient along fiber direction). Tablecloth damask pattern tiled with patternUnits='userSpaceOnUse'. Require shadow color bleed and occlusion contacts correctly layered.

Create an Edo-period Nihonbashi bridge scene rendered as a woodblock-print-style SVG with a disguised modern drone-kite (viewBox 0 0 2100 1200). Limit palette to 12 flat hues; emulate woodgrain/paper with feTurbulence masked noise. Perspective: low horizon y=780; VP at (1050,780). Bridge arch follows catenary y=a cosh(x/a) with a scaled to 220 px rise over 1600 px span. Kimono patterns respect era-appropriate motifs (seigaiha, asanoha) on pattern fills aligned to body contours. The drone masquerades as a kite: bamboo frame strokes, but faint rotor disks suggested by radial-gradient blur rings (no motion lines crossing the frame). Simulate registration misalignment by offsetting cyan/magenta plates by 1–2 px. River ripples: repeated paths with slight random jitter. Include kanji signage using textPath along noren.

Cutaway of a 1930s Art Deco ocean liner engine room with turbo-electric drive (viewBox 0 0 2400 1300). Show steam turbine (rotor Ø1800 mm) coupled to generator (stator Ø2200 mm), feeding twin 10 MW motors; belt and shaft centerlines align in perspective. Pipe color coding: steam (red, Ø300 mm), condensate (blue, Ø150 mm), lube oil (yellow, Ø75 mm). Riveted plates use a symbol rivet at 120 mm spacing along curved paths. Illumination 4000K from catwalk fixtures; add metallic highlights via feSpecularLighting with feSpotLight. Include manometers with correct Bourdon-tube needle deflection under nominal 1.2 MPa. Steam plume as feTurbulence+feDisplacementMap composited over background only. Safety signage with DIN 1451 text; ladders 75° pitch. Perspective: two-point; horizon y=640; VPs at (-3800,640) and (5200,640).

Nighttime natural history museum diorama featuring a Smilodon skeleton and reflective terrazzo floor (viewBox 0 0 2000 1200). Skeleton proportions: canine length ≈ 28 cm, skull length ≈ 30 cm, scapula tall 22 cm; 7 lumbar vertebrae; tail short. Mount rods discretely under mandible and pelvis. Moonlight at 15° right casts cool beams through skylight; dust shafts via masked gradients. Floor reflection uses feDisplacementMap with subtle noise to suggest polish imperfections; intensity drops with distance. Wall plaque microtext 2.2 mm cap height (scale correctly); red security LED with faint bloom. Include janitor silhouette mopping, reflection aligned. Perspective: horizon y=900; VP at (1000,900). Ensure occlusion ordering of ribs, shadows across plinth, and parallax separation of backdrop painting layers.

Design an Escher-inspired multi-level library that blends 3-point perspective with isometric illusions (viewBox 0 0 2200 1400). Vertical vanishing point at (1100,-2600); horizontals at (-4200,700) and (6400,700). Stairs invert gradients at landings to force perceptual flips; railings maintain constant stroke via vector-effect='non-scaling-stroke'. Shelves: book spines 240 mm tall standard; occasional folios 380 mm; pack ratios realistic. Central brass orrery: planetary radii proportional (not scale distances), with Saturn’s ring ellipticity correct for 35° tilt via skew transform; highlights via feSpecularLighting. Scholars from distinct eras (Togas, abayas, frock coats) reading by green-shaded lamps at 3000K. Latin and Greek quotes as text-on-path along helices. Require cast shadows coherent to all three VPs, and impossible connections hidden by precise layer clipping.
